action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several pixelated shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a purple cross shape, green L-shaped figures, orange L-shaped figures, and pink T-shaped figures. The shapes are scattered and do not form a coherent pattern.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a purple plus sign, green L-shaped pieces, pink T-shaped pieces, and orange L-shaped pieces. The shapes are scattered and not connected to each other.
